name: FFL Dealers
author: shafiq

sections.description:
FFL Dealers WooCommerce plugin only works on the websites that has WooCommerce plugin. These eCommerce stores can implement user-friendly features that benefit the dealers and their customers. FFL Dealers provides a service that everybody needs in the process of buying FFL products online. the plugin will provide you very latest dealers information nearby you. the plugin has more than 80 thousands unique dealers available and dealers information will be updating from atf.gov in every month automatically. it’s totally free of cost
Learn More

Free of cost

the plugin is created totaly with free of cost and no need instalation fee.

Checkout modal

you can show or hide modal in checkout page for displaying company message. you can change color of modal. you can use banner or text in the modal.

Map icon

There is a default icon for google map locator. you can change the icon from setting page easily.

show map by specific category

you can show dealers locator map under specific category in checkout page.

Blacklist

You can hide some licenses and zipcode from search

Deafault Dealers

You can show some dealers in checkout page after loading the checkout page.

Demo

Demo

Support

Github

Licence

GPL Version 3
sections.installation:
In order to use FFL Dealers, you need google map api key.
You can see how to get Google Maps API Key from the link below.
https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/maps-static/get-api-key

Learn More
sections.faq:
1. do I’ve to pay for using FFL dealers?
    No. it’s totally free. but you’ve to buy google map api to show dealers locator in google map

Please support me
sections.changelog:

  • Release

1.1.6 2023-03-20

1.1.7 2023-06-21

  • default location google map
  • more and easy functionality for css style from ffl admin setting page.

1.1.8 2023-08-02

  • Javascript bug fixed

1.1.9 2023-08-16

  • Now user are allowed to add,update and delete dealer

2.0.0 2023-08-16

  • Now user are allowed to add,update and delete dealer

2.0.1 2024-03-02

  • included functionality:- shortcode, blacklist, default list and style

2.0.2 2024-06-29

  • database updated

screenshots.caption: Blacklist - you can block dealer and zipcode from search result
default - you can show some dealer in checkout page by default
Map settings- you can hide or show google map in checkout page and set up other setting for google map
style -you can do style without any coding
pro - Pro version and free version are same functionality. but using the pro version, you can get the updated dealer database in every month.
Google map in checkout- how the dealer search result looks in checkout page
Google map at modal in checkout- how the dealer search result looks in checkout page
